long_description: The perfect assistant for your two-wheeled adventures, the Haiku olive print Handlebar Tote straps on to your bike's handlebars to carry your iPad or other tablet as well as other daily essentials. Recycled polyethylene is made from plastic beverage bottles; this textured fabric is durable and soft, yet tough. Rip-and-stick handlebar straps detach when not in use; includes key fob attachment that doubles as a handlbar stem attachment. Includes short straps for hand carrying and long straps for wearing cross-body. Haiku recommends the Handelbar Tote for use with cruisers only. Secure snap closure at top; internal zip and open pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The perfect assistant for your two-wheeled adventures, the Haiku olive print Handlebar Tote straps on to your bike's handlebars to carry your iPad or other tablet as well as other daily essentials.
